name: Maxthon Browser
description: Maxthon is a cloud browser based on Chromium. It integrates Maxthon account, favorites and intelligent form filling sync, quick access, mouse gestures, super dragging, automatic update, data sync and plug-in system function.

en_US.description: Maxthon is a cloud browser based on Chromium. It integrates Maxthon account, favorites and intelligent form filling sync, quick access, mouse gestures, super dragging, automatic update, data sync and plug-in system function.
en_US.name: Maxthon Browser

zh_CN.description: 傲游云浏览器是一款基于Chromium开发的云浏览器，它集成了傲游账户、收藏和智能填表同步、快速访问、鼠标手势、超级拖拽、自动更新等功能，同时具有数据同步、插件系统功能。
zh_CN.name: 傲游云浏览器
